component.name: Barforge
component.summary: Browse, install, and manage Waybar modules

description.p: Barforge is a graphical application for discovering, installing, and managing custom modules for Waybar, the highly customizable status bar for Wayland compositors.

ul.li: Browse a curated registry of waybar modules
One-click installation of modules with automatic config merging
Enable, disable, and uninstall modules easily
Configure module preferences through a friendly interface
Dark theme optimized for desktop integration

screenshot.caption: Main browse view showing available modules

ul.li: Landlock sandbox for script isolation
Minisign Ed25519 signature verification
Revocation checking with fail-closed defaults
Dependency checking for binaries and Python modules
Streaming downloads with 50MB size limit
Algebraic path normalization preventing TOCTOU attacks
SecureInstaller orchestrating verified package installation

description.p: Code quality and test infrastructure improvements

ul.li: Comprehensive integration test suite
Improved code organization with handler extraction
Enhanced CI/CD with security scanning and coverage
TypeScript type generation for API consumers
Performance benchmarks
Proper error handling when registry unavailable
Add pre-built binary installer via cargo-dist
Add Flatpak local build instructions
Improve README documentation
Fix panic in preferences modal
Fix uninstall not cleaning CSS and config
Fix module update preserving enabled state
